title: Selena Gomez sparks Niall Horan romance rumours after she's seen sneaking into his mansion
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Selena Gomez was seen sneaking into Niall Horan's house last weekend, sparking rumours of a romance between the pair.

The singer, 27, was spotted arriving at his mansion in LA with a big bag of groceries.

She tried to keep a low profile as she turned up in a cosy sweater, denim cut-off shorts and a pair of white trainers.

Selena's shopping bag appeared to be full of sweet treats including ice cream and fruit salad, while she carried a Louis Vuitton hangbag on her other arm.

There was so sign of One Direction alum, Niall, 26, who seemed to be waiting for her inside.

(Image: Clint Brewer / BACKGRID)

(Image: Instagram)

The visit comes after the duo enjoyed a night out together on Thursday.

A mutual friend had shared a photo of a group outing, with the pair looking very cosy on the end.

Niall slipped an arm around Selena as they posed for the black and white snap.

(Image: Clint Brewer / BACKGRID)

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

Fans flooded the snap with comments about their night out, with one writing: "Good looking couple I'd say!"

Another posted: "They both seem like sweet, fun, down to earth people so if they become a couple good for them - they certainly deserve it."

A third agreed: "Yes Selena, get yourself a nice down to earth Irish guy."

(Image: aquellestevens/Instagram)

The pair have been friends for years and have consistently denied there's anything else between them.

"Oh my god, no," she said when asked about them having a relationship.

"I love him, I always have. He's amazing."
description: The Hands to Myself singer, 27, was seen arriving at his mansion in LA with a big bag of groceries over the weekend
